version.name: v1
version.xform: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <xf:xforms xmlns:xf="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xf:model> <xf:instance id="death"> <death id="7" name="Client Death"> <staffId/> <facilityId/> <date/> <motechId/> <formtype>data_entry</formtype> <formname>death-jf</formname> </death> </xf:instance> <xf:bind id="staffId" nodeset="/death/staffId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind id="facilityId" nodeset="/death/facilityId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind constraint=". <= 'today()'" id="date" message="Invalid date: date specified is in the future" nodeset="/death/date" required="true()" type="xsd:date"/> <xf:bind id="motechId" nodeset="/death/motechId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". > 999999 and . < 10000000" message="MoTeCH ID must be 7 digits long"/> <xf:bind id="formtype" nodeset="/death/formtype" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="formname" nodeset="/death/formname" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> </xf:model> <xf:group id="1"> <xf:label>Page3</xf:label> <xf:input bind="staffId"> <xf:label>Staff ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="facilityId"> <xf:label>Facility ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="date"> <xf:label>Date of death</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="motechId"> <xf:label>MoTeCH ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="formtype"> <xf:label>formType</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="formname"> <xf:label>formName</xf:label> </xf:input> </xf:group> </xf:xforms>
version.layout: <Form id="7"> <Page Text="Page3" Binding="Page3" Width="100%" Height="276px" backgroundColor=""> <Item WidgetType="Label" Text="Enter your CHPS ID" HelpText="Staff ID" death" Binding="date" Left="150px" Top="100px" Width="200px" Height="25px" TabIndex="3" fontFamily="Verdana,'Lucida Grande','Trebuchet MS',Arial,Sans-Serif"/> <Item WidgetType="Label" Text="Cause of death" HelpText="Cause of death" Binding="cause" Left="20px" Top="140px" TabIndex="0" fontFamily="Verdana,'Lucida Grande','Trebuchet MS',Arial,Sans-Serif"/> <Item WidgetType="ListBox" HelpText="Cause of death" Binding="cause" Left="160px" Top="140px" Width="200px" Height="25px" TabIndex="4" fontFamily="Verdana,'Lucida Grande','Trebuchet MS',Arial,Sans-Serif"/> <Item WidgetType="Label" HelpText="formType" Binding="formtype" Left="100px" Top="180px" Width="200px" Height="25px" TabIndex="5" fontFamily="Verdana,'Lucida Grande','Trebuchet MS',Arial,Sans-Serif"/> <Item WidgetType="Button" Text="Submit" HelpText="submit" Binding="submit" Left="20px" Top="230px" Width="70px" Height="30px" TabIndex="0" fontFamily="Verdana,'Lucida Grande','Trebuchet
